sql_query: SELECT (SUM(t.price) / SUM(r.distance_miles * a.capacity)) as rasm FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id JOIN Tickets t ON f.flight_id = t.flight_id JOIN Routes r ON f.route_id = r.route_id JOIN Aircrafts a ON f.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id WHERE al.name = 'Delta Air Lines';

natural_language_query: Find the most common time of day for flight delays.
sql_query: SELECT STRFTIME('%H', scheduled_departure_time) as hour, COUNT(*) as delay_count FROM Flights WHERE status = 'Delayed' GROUP BY hour ORDER BY delay_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have a 'celebrity' or 'VIP' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Passengers p ON b.passenger_id = p.passenger_id WHERE p.passenger_type IN ('Celebrity', 'VIP');

natural_language_query: Find the number of flights that have been diverted due to a medical emergency.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Flights WHERE status = 'Diverted' AND diversion_reason LIKE '%medical%';

natural_language_query: Show the distribution of passenger ages.
sql_query: SELECT CASE WHEN age < 18 THEN '0-17' WHEN age BETWEEN 18 AND 35 THEN '18-35' WHEN age BETWEEN 36 AND 60 THEN '36-60' ELSE '60+' END as age_group, COUNT(*) FROM Passengers GROUP BY age_group;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'deportee' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Passengers p ON b.passenger_id = p.passenger_id WHERE p.is_deportee = 1;

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a 'fast track' security lane.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Fast Track%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of crew members per aircraft type.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, AVG(c.pilot_count + c.copilot_count + c.cabin_crew_count) FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Crews c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer;

natural_language_query: Update the flight's catering order.
sql_query: UPDATE Catering SET quantity = 150 WHERE flight_id = 789 AND item = 'Chicken Sandwich';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'human remains' transport.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.content_type = 'Human Remains';

natural_language_query: List all passengers who have flown on every aircraft type of an airline.
sql_query: SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name FROM Passengers p WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT DISTINCT a.model FROM Aircrafts a WHERE a.airline_id = 1 EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT a2.model FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Aircrafts a2 ON f.aircraft_id = a2.aircraft_id WHERE b.passenger_id = p.passenger_id AND a2.airline_id = 1);

natural_language_query: Calculate the cost per available seat mile (CASM) for an airline.
sql_query: SELECT (SUM(c.total_cost) / SUM(r.distance_miles * a.capacity)) as casm FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id JOIN Costs c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id JOIN Routes r ON f.route_id = r.route_id JOIN Aircrafts a ON f.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id WHERE al.name = 'United Airlines';

natural_language_query: Find the most common day of the week for booking flights.
sql_query: SELECT STRFTIME('%w', booking_date) as day_of_week, COUNT(*) as booking_count FROM Bookings GROUP BY day_of_week ORDER BY booking_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have a 'diplomatic courier' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Passengers p ON f.flight_id = p.flight_id WHERE p.passenger_type = 'Diplomatic Courier';

natural_language_query: Find the number of flights that have been affected by a volcanic ash cloud.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FlightDelays WHERE reason LIKE '%volcanic ash%';

natural_language_query: Show the number of passengers per loyalty tier for each airline.
sql_query: SELECT al.name, p.loyalty_tier, COUNT(DISTINCT p.passenger_id) FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Passengers p ON b.passenger_id = p.passenger_id GROUP BY al.name, p.loyalty_tier;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'live animal' in cargo.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.content_type = 'Live Animal';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a chapel or prayer room.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Prayer Room%' OR amenities LIKE '%Chapel%';

natural_language_query: Find the average time it takes for baggage to be delivered to the carousel.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(strftime('%s', baggage_claim_time) - strftime('%s', arrival_time))/60.0 as avg_baggage_delivery_minutes FROM Flights;

natural_language_query: Update the aircraft's livery.
sql_query: UPDATE Aircrafts SET livery = 'Special Star Wars Livery' WHERE registration = 'JA873A';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'stretcher case' passenger.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN SpecialRequests sr ON b.booking_id = sr.booking_id WHERE sr.request_type = 'Stretcher Case';

natural_language_query: List all pilots who are reaching retirement age this year.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Pilots WHERE (CAST(strftime('%Y', 'now') AS INTEGER) - CAST(strftime('%Y', date_of_birth) AS INTEGER)) >= 65;

natural_language_query: Calculate the passenger load factor for flights on weekends vs. weekdays.
sql_query: SELECT CASE WHEN STRFTIME('%w', f.departure_time) IN ('0', '6') THEN 'Weekend' ELSE 'Weekday' END as day_type, (SUM(pax_count) * 100.0) / SUM(capacity) as load_factor FROM (SELECT f.departure_time, a.capacity, COUNT(b.booking_id) as pax_count FROM Flights f JOIN Aircrafts a ON f.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id LEFT JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id GROUP BY f.flight_id) GROUP BY day_type;

natural_language_query: Find the most common connecting city for flights from a specific origin.
sql_query: SELECT arr.city, COUNT(*) as connection_count FROM Flights f1 JOIN Flights f2 ON f1.arrival_airport_id = f2.departure_airport_id JOIN Airports arr ON f1.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE f1.departure_airport_id = (SELECT airport_id FROM Airports WHERE iata_code = 'SYD') GROUP BY arr.city ORDER BY connection_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have a 'gluten-free' meal as the most requested special meal.
sql_query: WITH MealCounts AS (SELECT flight_id, request_type, COUNT(*) as meal_count, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY flight_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) as rnk FROM SpecialRequests WHERE request_type LIKE '%Meal%' GROUP BY flight_id, request_type) SELECT mc.flight_id FROM MealCounts mc WHERE mc.rnk = 1 AND mc.request_type = 'Gluten-Free Meal';

natural_language_query: Find the number of flights that have been affected by a drone sighting.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FlightDisruptions WHERE reason = 'Drone Sighting';

natural_language_query: Show the on-time performance of an airline during holidays.
sql_query: SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN f.status = 'On-time' THEN 1 END) * 100.0) / COUNT(*) FROM Flights f JOIN Holidays h ON DATE(f.departure_time) = h.date WHERE f.airline_id = 1;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'valuable cargo' declaration.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.is_valuable = 1;

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a children's play area.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Play Area%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of days in advance passengers book flights for each season.
sql_query: SELECT CASE WHEN STRFTIME('%m', f.departure_time) IN ('12', '01', '02') THEN 'Winter' WHEN STRFTIME('%m', f.departure_time) IN ('03', '04', '05') THEN 'Spring' WHEN STRFTIME('%m', f.departure_time) IN ('06', '07', '08') THEN 'Summer' ELSE 'Autumn' END as season, AVG(JULIANDAY(f.departure_time) - JULIANDAY(b.booking_date)) as avg_booking_advance FROM Bookings b JOIN Flights f ON b.flight_id = f.flight_id GROUP BY season;

natural_language_query: Update the pilot's flight hours.
sql_query: UPDATE Pilots SET flight_hours = flight_hours + 5.5 WHERE pilot_id = 123;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'prisoner' transport.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Passengers p ON f.flight_id = p.flight_id WHERE p.passenger_type = 'Prisoner';

natural_language_query: List all crew members who live in a specific city.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM CrewMembers WHERE city = 'Chicago';

natural_language_query: Calculate the revenue generated from excess baggage fees per flight.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number, SUM(b.excess_fee) FROM Flights f JOIN Baggage b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id GROUP BY f.flight_number;

natural_language_query: Find the most common cause of maintenance issues for a specific aircraft model.
sql_query: SELECT m.description, COUNT(*) as issue_count FROM Maintenance m JOIN Aircrafts a ON m.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id WHERE a.model = '737 MAX' GROUP BY m.description ORDER BY issue_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have a 'peanut allergy' note.
sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN SpecialRequests sr ON b.booking_id = sr.booking_id WHERE sr.details LIKE '%peanut allergy%';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have missed their flight.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Bookings WHERE status = 'No-show';

natural_language_query: Show the most popular optional services (e.g., extra legroom, priority boarding).
sql_query: SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) as purchase_count FROM AncillaryServices GROUP BY service_name ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'sky marshal' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Crew c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.role = 'Air Marshal';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a pet relief area.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Pet Relief Area%';

natural_language_query: Find the average age of passengers for each airline.
sql_query: SELECT al.name, AVG(p.age) FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Passengers p ON b.passenger_id = p.passenger_id GROUP BY al.name;

natural_language_query: Update the aircraft's status to 'Under Maintenance'.
sql_query: UPDATE Aircrafts SET status = 'Under Maintenance' WHERE registration = 'A6-EDV';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'musical instrument' as special baggage.
sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Baggage bg ON b.booking_id = bg.booking_id WHERE bg.type = 'Musical Instrument';

natural_language_query: List all cabin crew members who are multilingual.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM CabinCrew WHERE language_count > 1;

natural_language_query: Calculate the percentage of revenue from business class tickets for each airline.
sql_query: SELECT al.name, (SUM(CASE WHEN t.class = 'Business' THEN t.price ELSE 0 END) * 100.0) / SUM(t.price) as business_class_rev_pct FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id JOIN Tickets t ON f.flight_id = t.flight_id GROUP BY al.name;

natural_language_query: Find the most common flight path between two cities.
sql_query: SELECT path_geometry, COUNT(*) as freq FROM FlightPaths WHERE departure_city = 'London' AND arrival_city = 'New York' GROUP BY path_geometry ORDER BY freq DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a security breach.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'Security Breach';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have purchased travel insurance.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Bookings WHERE has_travel_insurance = 1;

natural_language_query: Show the most common aircraft configuration for a specific model.
sql_query: SELECT configuration_code, COUNT(*) as freq FROM AircraftConfigurations WHERE model = 'A350' GROUP BY configuration_code ORDER BY freq DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'wine tasting' experience on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardExperiences oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.name = 'Wine Tasting';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a pharmacy.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Pharmacy%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of pieces of luggage per passenger.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(luggage_count) FROM (SELECT b.passenger_id, COUNT(bg.baggage_id) as luggage_count FROM Bookings b JOIN Baggage bg ON b.booking_id = bg.booking_id GROUP BY b.passenger_id);

natural_language_query: Update the airline's slogan.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET slogan = 'Fly the Friendly Skies' WHERE name = 'United Airlines';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'celebratory cake' request for a birthday.
sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN SpecialRequests sr ON b.booking_id = sr.booking_id WHERE sr.request_type = 'Birthday Cake';

natural_language_query: List all maintenance technicians who are certified for a specific aircraft type.
sql_query: SELECT t.* FROM Technicians t JOIN TechnicianCertifications tc ON t.technician_id = tc.technician_id WHERE tc.aircraft_model = '787';

natural_language_query: Calculate the on-time arrival rate for each airport.
sql_query: SELECT ap.name, (COUNT(CASE WHEN f.status = 'On-time' THEN 1 END) * 100.0) / COUNT(f.flight_id) as on_time_arrival_pct FROM Airports ap JOIN Flights f ON ap.airport_id = f.arrival_airport_id GROUP BY ap.name;

natural_language_query: Find the most common destination from a specific airport during summer.
sql_query: SELECT arr.name, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Flights f JOIN Airports dep ON f.departure_airport_id = dep.airport_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE dep.iata_code = 'MUC' AND STRFTIME('%m', f.departure_time) IN ('06', '07', '08') GROUP BY arr.name ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been used for a movie shoot.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights WHERE flight_id IN (SELECT flight_id FROM SpecialEvents WHERE event_type = 'Movie Shoot');

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have used a wheelchair service.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.passenger_id) FROM Bookings b JOIN SpecialRequests sr ON b.booking_id = sr.booking_id WHERE sr.request_type = 'Wheelchair Assistance';

natural_language_query: Show the most common payment method for tickets.
sql_query: SELECT payment_method, COUNT(*) as transaction_count FROM Transactions GROUP BY payment_method ORDER BY transaction_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'chef on board'.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Crew c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.role = 'Chef';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a rooftop pool.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Rooftop Pool%';

natural_language_query: Find the average spend on ancillary services per passenger.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(total_spend) FROM (SELECT passenger_id, SUM(price) as total_spend FROM AncillaryPurchases GROUP BY passenger_id);

natural_language_query: Update the aircraft's Wi-Fi provider.
sql_query: UPDATE AircraftAmenities SET provider = 'Viasat' WHERE aircraft_id = 123 AND amenity_type = 'Wi-Fi';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'sports equipment' baggage request.
sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Baggage bg ON b.booking_id = bg.booking_id WHERE bg.type = 'Sports Equipment';

natural_language_query: List all flight attendants who speak a specific language (e.g., Mandarin).
sql_query: SELECT * FROM FlightAttendants fa JOIN AttendantLanguages al ON fa.attendant_id = al.attendant_id WHERE al.language = 'Mandarin';

natural_language_query: Calculate the percentage of direct flights vs. connecting flights.
sql_query: SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN is_direct THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0) / COUNT(*) as direct_pct, (SUM(CASE WHEN NOT is_direct THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0) / COUNT(*) as connecting_pct FROM (SELECT ticket_id, COUNT(flight_id) = 1 as is_direct FROM Bookings GROUP BY ticket_id);

natural_language_query: Find the most common time for maintenance checks.
sql_query: SELECT STRFTIME('%H', maintenance_date) as hour, COUNT(*) as check_count FROM Maintenance GROUP BY hour ORDER BY check_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a bird strike.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightEvents fe ON f.flight_id = fe.flight_id WHERE fe.event_type = 'Bird Strike';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have upgraded their seats.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SeatUpgrades;

natural_language_query: Show the most popular duty-free items sold on board.
sql_query: SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) as total_sold FROM DutyFreeSales GROUP BY item_name ORDER BY total_sold DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'sommelier' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Crew c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.role = 'Sommelier';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have an art gallery.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Art Gallery%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of checked bags per passenger.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(bag_count) FROM (SELECT passenger_id, COUNT(*) as bag_count FROM CheckedBaggage GROUP BY passenger_id);

natural_language_query: Update the airline's IATA code.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET iata_code = 'LH' WHERE name = 'Lufthansa';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'wedding proposal' special request.
sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN SpecialRequests sr ON b.booking_id = sr.booking_id WHERE sr.request_type = 'Wedding Proposal';

natural_language_query: List all ground staff who are on duty at a specific time.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM GroundStaff WHERE shift_start <= '14:00:00' AND shift_end >= '14:00:00';

natural_language_query: Calculate the revenue from last-minute bookings.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(t.price) FROM Tickets t JOIN Bookings b ON t.booking_id = b.booking_id JOIN Flights f ON b.flight_id = f.flight_id WHERE JULIANDAY(f.departure_time) - JULIANDAY(b.booking_date) <= 1;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for each airline.
sql_query: WITH RankedModels AS (SELECT al.name as airline, a.model, COUNT(f.flight_id) as flight_count, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY al.name ORDER BY COUNT(f.flight_id) DESC) as rnk FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id JOIN Aircrafts a ON f.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id GROUP BY al.name, a.model) SELECT airline, model, flight_count FROM RankedModels WHERE rnk = 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a cyber attack.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'Cyber Attack';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have used a self-service check-in kiosk.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT passenger_id) FROM CheckIns WHERE method = 'Kiosk';

natural_language_query: Show the most popular destinations for solo travelers.
sql_query: SELECT arr.name, COUNT(*) as solo_traveler_count FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE b.passenger_count = 1 GROUP BY arr.name ORDER BY solo_traveler_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'mixologist' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Crew c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.role = 'Mixologist';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have an IMAX theater.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%IMAX%';

natural_language_query: Find the average price of a flight per mile for each travel class.
sql_query: SELECT t.class, AVG(t.price / r.distance_miles) as avg_price_per_mile FROM Tickets t JOIN Flights f ON t.flight_id = f.flight_id JOIN Routes r ON f.route_id = r.route_id GROUP BY t.class;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's headquarters location.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET hq_city = 'Atlanta', hq_country = 'USA' WHERE name = 'Delta Air Lines';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'surprise party' request.
sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN SpecialRequests sr ON b.booking_id = sr.booking_id WHERE sr.request_type = 'Surprise Party';

natural_language_query: List all security personnel who are certified for K-9 handling.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM SecurityPersonnel WHERE certification = 'K-9 Handling';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total value of cargo transported by an airline.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(c.declared_value) FROM Cargo c JOIN Flights f ON c.flight_id = f.flight_id WHERE f.airline_id = 1;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights to island destinations.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE arr.is_island_destination = 1 GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a runway closure.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason LIKE '%Runway Closure%';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have purchased carbon offsets.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Bookings WHERE purchased_carbon_offset = 1;

natural_language_query: Show the most popular in-flight entertainment genres.
sql_query: SELECT genre, COUNT(*) as view_count FROM InflightEntertainmentViews GROUP BY genre ORDER BY view_count DESC;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'barista' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Crew c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.role = 'Barista';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a casino.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Casino%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of days passengers stay at their destination.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(JULIANDAY(return_flight.departure_time) - JULIANDAY(outbound_flight.arrival_time)) FROM Tickets t JOIN Flights outbound_flight ON t.outbound_flight_id = outbound_flight.flight_id JOIN Flights return_flight ON t.return_flight_id = return_flight.flight_id;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's logo URL.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET logo_url = 'http://example.com/new_logo.png' WHERE name = 'Example Air';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'marriage officiant' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Crew c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.role = 'Marriage Officiant';

natural_language_query: List all catering staff who have a food handling certification.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM CateringStaff WHERE certification = 'Food Handling';

natural_language_query: Calculate the ancillary revenue per passenger for an airline.
sql_query: SELECT (SUM(asp.price) / COUNT(DISTINCT asp.passenger_id)) as arpp FROM AncillaryServicePurchases asp JOIN Flights f ON asp.flight_id = f.flight_id WHERE f.airline_id = 1;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for red-eye flights.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id WHERE STRFTIME('%H', f.departure_time) BETWEEN '22' AND '04' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a baggage system failure.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'Baggage System Failure';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a multi-city trip.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ticket_id) FROM Bookings WHERE is_multicity = 1;

natural_language_query: Show the most popular routes for business travel.
sql_query: SELECT r.name, COUNT(*) as business_travel_count FROM Routes r JOIN Flights f ON r.route_id = f.route_id JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id WHERE b.travel_purpose = 'Business' GROUP BY r.name ORDER BY business_travel_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'personal shopper' service.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardServices os ON f.flight_id = os.flight_id WHERE os.service_name = 'Personal Shopper';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a golf course.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Golf Course%';

natural_language_query: Find the average fare difference between booking directly with the airline vs. through a third-party site.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(CASE WHEN b.booking_channel = 'Direct' THEN t.price END) - AVG(CASE WHEN b.booking_channel = 'OTA' THEN t.price END) FROM Bookings b JOIN Tickets t ON b.booking_id = t.booking_id;

natural_language_query: Update the pilot's medical certificate expiry date.
sql_query: UPDATE Pilots SET medical_expiry_date = '2024-12-31' WHERE pilot_id = 456;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'live band' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEntertainment oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.type = 'Live Band';

natural_language_query: List all air traffic controllers at a specific airport.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM AirTrafficControllers WHERE airport_id = (SELECT airport_id FROM Airports WHERE iata_code = 'ATL');

natural_language_query: Calculate the total amount of compensation paid out for delayed flights.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(compensation_amount) FROM FlightDelays;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights operated by a specific alliance.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Airlines al ON f.airline_id = al.airline_id WHERE al.alliance = 'SkyTeam' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a fuel shortage.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'Fuel Shortage';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who are part of a family booking.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT passenger_id) FROM Bookings WHERE group_type = 'Family';

natural_language_query: Show the most popular travel months for each destination.
sql_query: WITH RankedMonths AS (SELECT arr.name as destination, STRFTIME('%m', f.departure_time) as month, COUNT(*) as passenger_count, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY arr.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) as rnk FROM Flights f JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id GROUP BY arr.name, month) SELECT destination, month, passenger_count FROM RankedMonths WHERE rnk = 1;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'magician' performing on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEntertainment oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.type = 'Magician';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a sleeping pod facility.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Sleeping Pods%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of flights a passenger takes per year.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(flight_count) FROM (SELECT passenger_id, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Bookings b JOIN Flights f ON b.flight_id = f.flight_id WHERE STRFTIME('%Y', f.departure_time) = '2023' GROUP BY passenger_id);

natural_language_query: Update the cabin crew's training records.
sql_query: UPDATE CabinCrewTraining SET completion_date = '2023-10-15' WHERE crew_id = 789 AND course_name = 'Emergency Evacuation';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'comedian' performing on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEntertainment oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.type = 'Comedian';

natural_language_query: List all baggage handlers at a specific terminal.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM BaggageHandlers WHERE airport_id = 123 AND terminal = 'C';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from seat upgrade fees.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(upgrade_fee) FROM SeatUpgrades;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying perishable cargo.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.is_perishable = 1 GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a crew shortage.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'Crew Shortage';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a round-the-world ticket.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT passenger_id) FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_type = 'Round the World';

natural_language_query: Show the most popular payment currencies for tickets.
sql_query: SELECT currency, COUNT(*) as transaction_count FROM Transactions GROUP BY currency ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'DJ' playing music on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEntertainment oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.type = 'DJ Set';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a yoga studio.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Yoga Studio%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of social media mentions for each airline per day.
sql_query: SELECT airline_name, AVG(mention_count) FROM DailySocialMediaMentions GROUP BY airline_name;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's customer service phone number.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET customer_service_phone = '+1-800-555-0199' WHERE name = 'Example Air';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'poetry reading' session.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEntertainment oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.type = 'Poetry Reading';

natural_language_query: List all aircraft cleaners for a specific flight.
sql_query: SELECT s.* FROM Staff s JOIN FlightAssignments fa ON s.staff_id = fa.staff_id WHERE fa.flight_id = 1234 AND s.role = 'Cleaner';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total cost of in-flight catering for an airline per month.
sql_query: SELECT STRFTIME('%Y-%m', f.departure_time) as month, SUM(c.cost) FROM Flights f JOIN CateringOrders c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE f.airline_id = 1 GROUP BY month;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights with a high number of business class passengers.
sql_query: WITH BusinessPaxCounts AS (SELECT flight_id, COUNT(*) as biz_pax_count FROM Bookings WHERE class = 'Business' GROUP BY flight_id) SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN BusinessPaxCounts bpc ON f.flight_id = bpc.flight_id WHERE bpc.biz_pax_count > 20 GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a computer system outage.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'IT Outage';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who are traveling for leisure vs. business.
sql_query: SELECT travel_purpose, COUNT(*) FROM Bookings GROUP BY travel_purpose;

natural_language_query: Show the most popular in-flight movies.
sql_query: SELECT movie_title, COUNT(*) as view_count FROM InflightMovieViews GROUP BY movie_title ORDER BY view_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'language lesson' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardClasses oc ON f.flight_id = oc.flight_id WHERE oc.class_name LIKE '%Language Lesson%';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a virtual reality arcade.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%VR Arcade%';

natural_language_query: Find the average passenger satisfaction score for each airline.
sql_query: SELECT al.name, AVG(ps.score) FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id JOIN PassengerSurveys ps ON f.flight_id = ps.flight_id GROUP BY al.name;

natural_language_query: Update the aircraft's next scheduled maintenance date.
sql_query: UPDATE Aircrafts SET next_maintenance_date = '2024-03-01' WHERE registration = 'N123AA';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'cooking class' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardClasses oc ON f.flight_id = oc.flight_id WHERE oc.class_name = 'Cooking Class';

natural_language_query: List all immigration officers on duty at an airport.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM ImmigrationOfficers WHERE airport_id = 123 AND on_duty = 1;

natural_language_query: Calculate the total amount of taxes collected from ticket sales.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(taxes) FROM Tickets;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying hazardous materials.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.is_hazardous = 1 GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a pilot strike.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'Pilot Strike';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked their flight using a mobile app.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Bookings WHERE booking_channel = 'Mobile App';

natural_language_query: Show the most popular seats on a specific aircraft type.
sql_query: SELECT seat_number, COUNT(*) as selection_count FROM Bookings b JOIN Flights f ON b.flight_id = f.flight_id JOIN Aircrafts a ON f.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id WHERE a.model = 'A380' GROUP BY seat_number ORDER BY selection_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'financial planning seminar' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardClasses oc ON f.flight_id = oc.flight_id WHERE oc.class_name = 'Financial Planning Seminar';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a microbrewery.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Microbrewery%';

natural_language_query: Find the average time passengers spend in the airport before departure.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(strftime('%s', f.departure_time) - strftime('%s', p.arrival_at_airport_time))/60.0 FROM Flights f JOIN Passengers p ON f.passenger_id = p.passenger_id;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's social media handle for Twitter.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET twitter_handle = '@NewExampleAir' WHERE name = 'Example Air';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'storytelling session' for children.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEntertainment oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.type = 'Storytelling for Kids';

natural_language_query: List all customs officers at a specific border crossing point.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM CustomsOfficers WHERE location_id = 45;

natural_language_query: Calculate the total commission paid to travel agencies.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(commission_amount) FROM AgencyBookings;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for VIP charter flights.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id WHERE f.flight_type = 'Charter' AND f.charter_client_type = 'VIP' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a cabin crew strike.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'Cabin Crew Strike';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have checked in but did not board the flight.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Bookings WHERE status = 'Checked-in' AND passenger_id NOT IN (SELECT passenger_id FROM BoardingPasses WHERE flight_id = Bookings.flight_id);

natural_language_query: Show the most popular ancillary services purchased by business travelers.
sql_query: SELECT ans.service_name, COUNT(*) as purchase_count FROM AncillaryServicePurchases anp JOIN Bookings b ON anp.booking_id = b.booking_id JOIN AncillaryServices ans ON anp.service_id = ans.service_id WHERE b.travel_purpose = 'Business' GROUP BY ans.service_name ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'speed dating' event on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'Speed Dating';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a silent disco.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Silent Disco%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of days between a passenger's flights.
sql_query: WITH PassengerFlights AS (SELECT passenger_id, departure_time, LAG(departure_time, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY passenger_id ORDER BY departure_time) as previous_flight_date FROM Bookings b JOIN Flights f ON b.flight_id = f.flight_id) SELECT AVG(JULIANDAY(departure_time) - JULIANDAY(previous_flight_date)) FROM PassengerFlights WHERE previous_flight_date IS NOT NULL;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's CEO's name.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET ceo = 'Ed Bastian' WHERE name = 'Delta Air Lines';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'karaoke night'.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'Karaoke Night';

natural_language_query: List all de-icing crew members available at an airport.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM GroundCrew WHERE airport_id = 123 AND specialization = 'De-icing';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total cost savings from using more fuel-efficient aircraft.
sql_query: SELECT SUM((a_old.fuel_burn_rate - a_new.fuel_burn_rate) * f.distance_km * c.fuel_price) FROM Flights f JOIN Aircrafts a_new ON f.aircraft_id = a_new.aircraft_id JOIN Aircrafts a_old ON f.previous_aircraft_id = a_old.aircraft_id JOIN Costs c ON f.date = c.date;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying live organs for transplant.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.content_type = 'Live Organ' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a ground handling staff strike.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'Ground Handling Strike';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight and a hotel together.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT passenger_id) FROM Bookings WHERE has_hotel_booking = 1;

natural_language_query: Show the most popular in-flight snacks.
sql_query: SELECT snack_name, SUM(quantity_sold) as total_sold FROM InflightSnackSales GROUP BY snack_name ORDER BY total_sold DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'board game tournament' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'Board Game Tournament';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a butterfly garden.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Butterfly Garden%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of loyalty points earned per flight.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(loyalty_points_earned) FROM Bookings;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's stock ticker symbol.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET stock_symbol = 'DAL' WHERE name = 'Delta Air Lines';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'book club' meeting.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'Book Club Meeting';

natural_language_query: List all fuel truck drivers at an airport.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM GroundStaff WHERE airport_id = 123 AND role = 'Fuel Truck Driver';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from in-flight Wi-Fi sales.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(wifi_fee) FROM InflightWifiPurchases;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights to ski resorts in winter.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE arr.is_ski_resort_airport = 1 AND STRFTIME('%m', f.departure_time) IN ('12', '01', '02') GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a catering staff strike.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'Catering Strike';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight and a rental car together.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT passenger_id) FROM Bookings WHERE has_rental_car = 1;

natural_language_query: Show the most popular alcoholic beverages sold on board.
sql_query: SELECT beverage_name, SUM(quantity_sold) as total_sold FROM InflightBeverageSales WHERE is_alcoholic = 1 GROUP BY beverage_name ORDER BY total_sold DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'knitting circle' meeting.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'Knitting Circle';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a zen garden.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Zen Garden%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of upgrades per flight.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(upgrade_count) FROM (SELECT flight_id, COUNT(*) as upgrade_count FROM SeatUpgrades GROUP BY flight_id);

natural_language_query: Update the airline's website URL.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET website = 'https://www.delta.com' WHERE name = 'Delta Air Lines';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'film festival' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'In-Flight Film Festival';

natural_language_query: List all pushback tug operators at an airport.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM GroundStaff WHERE airport_id = 123 AND role = 'Pushback Operator';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from pet travel fees.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(pet_fee) FROM SpecialRequests WHERE request_type = 'Pet in Cabin';

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights to pilgrimage sites.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE arr.is_pilgrimage_site = 1 GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by an air traffic controller strike.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'ATC Strike';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight as part of a vacation package.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT passenger_id) FROM Bookings WHERE is_package_deal = 1;

natural_language_query: Show the most popular non-alcoholic beverages sold on board.
sql_query: SELECT beverage_name, SUM(quantity_sold) as total_sold FROM InflightBeverageSales WHERE is_alcoholic = 0 GROUP BY beverage_name ORDER BY total_sold DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'coding competition' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'Coding Competition';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have an indoor rainforest.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Indoor Rainforest%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of complaints per 1000 passengers for each airline.
sql_query: SELECT al.name, (COUNT(c.complaint_id) * 1000.0) / COUNT(DISTINCT b.passenger_id) as complaints_per_1000_pax FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id LEFT JOIN Complaints c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id GROUP BY al.name;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's call sign.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET callsign = 'SPEEDBIRD' WHERE name = 'British Airways';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'fashion show' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'Fashion Show';

natural_language_query: List all airport operations managers.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM AirportStaff WHERE role = 'Operations Manager';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from change fees.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(change_fee) FROM BookingChanges;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying diplomatic mail.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.content_type = 'Diplomatic Mail' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a public transportation strike.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FlightDisruptions fd ON f.flight_id = fd.flight_id WHERE fd.reason = 'Public Transport Strike';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight using a travel agent.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT passenger_id) FROM Bookings WHERE booking_channel = 'Travel Agent';

natural_language_query: Show the most popular routes for honeymooners.
sql_query: SELECT r.name, COUNT(*) as honeymoon_count FROM Routes r JOIN Flights f ON r.route_id = f.route_id JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN SpecialRequests sr ON b.booking_id = sr.booking_id WHERE sr.request_type = 'Honeymoon' GROUP BY r.name ORDER BY honeymoon_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'live concert' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'Live Concert';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have an ice skating rink.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Ice Rink%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of days between a maintenance check for each aircraft model.
sql_query: WITH MaintenanceGaps AS (SELECT aircraft_id, maintenance_date, LAG(maintenance_date, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY aircraft_id ORDER BY maintenance_date) as previous_maintenance_date FROM Maintenance) SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, AVG(JULIANDAY(mg.maintenance_date) - JULIANDAY(mg.previous_maintenance_date)) as avg_days_between_checks FROM MaintenanceGaps mg JOIN Aircrafts a ON mg.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id WHERE mg.previous_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's parent company.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET parent_company = 'International Airlines Group' WHERE name = 'British Airways';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'charity auction' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'Charity Auction';

natural_language_query: List all airline station managers at an airport.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM AirlineStaff WHERE airport_id = 123 AND role = 'Station Manager';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from unaccompanied minor fees.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(unaccompanied_minor_fee) FROM SpecialRequests WHERE request_type = 'Unaccompanied Minor';

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying film crews and equipment.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id JOIN Passengers p ON f.flight_id = p.flight_id WHERE c.content_type = 'Film Equipment' AND p.occupation = 'Film Crew' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a national holiday.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN NationalHolidays nh ON DATE(f.departure_time) = nh.date AND f.departure_country = nh.country;

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight with a stopover of more than 24 hours.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.passenger_id) FROM Tickets t JOIN Flights f1 ON t.flight1_id = f1.flight_id JOIN Flights f2 ON t.flight2_id = f2.flight_id WHERE (strftime('%s', f2.departure_time) - strftime('%s', f1.arrival_time)) > 86400;

natural_language_query: Show the most popular destinations for adventure travel.
sql_query: SELECT arr.name, COUNT(*) as adventure_traveler_count FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE b.travel_style = 'Adventure' GROUP BY arr.name ORDER BY adventure_traveler_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'wine pairing' dinner.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardDining od ON f.flight_id = od.flight_id WHERE od.experience = 'Wine Pairing Dinner';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a swimming pool.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Swimming Pool%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of flight segments per ticket.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(segment_count) FROM (SELECT ticket_id, COUNT(*) as segment_count FROM Bookings GROUP BY ticket_id);

natural_language_query: Update the airline's main hub.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET main_hub_iata = 'DXB' WHERE name = 'Emirates';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'murder mystery' game on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEvents oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.event_name = 'Murder Mystery Game';

natural_language_query: List all airline ticketing agents at an airport.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM AirlineStaff WHERE airport_id = 123 AND role = 'Ticketing Agent';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from in-flight shopping.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(price) FROM InflightPurchases;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying scientific research equipment.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.content_type = 'Scientific Equipment' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a royal event.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN SpecialEvents se ON DATE(f.departure_time) = se.date WHERE se.type = 'Royal Event';

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight using a corporate travel portal.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT passenger_id) FROM Bookings WHERE booking_channel = 'Corporate Portal';

natural_language_query: Show the most popular routes for family vacations.
sql_query: SELECT r.name, COUNT(*) as family_vacation_count FROM Routes r JOIN Flights f ON r.route_id = f.route_id JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id WHERE b.group_type = 'Family' GROUP BY r.name ORDER BY family_vacation_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'sushi making' class.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardClasses oc ON f.flight_id = oc.flight_id WHERE oc.class_name = 'Sushi Making Class';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a movie theater.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Movie Theater%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of passengers on flights that have been cancelled.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(pax_count) FROM (SELECT f.flight_id, COUNT(b.passenger_id) as pax_count FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id WHERE f.status = 'Cancelled' GROUP BY f.flight_id);

natural_language_query: Update the airline's frequent flyer program name.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET ffp_name = 'AAdvantage' WHERE name = 'American Airlines';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'stand-up comedy' show.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEntertainment oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.type = 'Stand-up Comedy';

natural_language_query: List all airline lounge staff at an airport.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM AirlineStaff WHERE airport_id = 123 AND role LIKE '%Lounge%';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from seat selection fees.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(seat_selection_fee) FROM Bookings;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying humanitarian aid.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.content_type = 'Humanitarian Aid' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a major sports event.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN MajorSportsEvents mse ON f.arrival_city = mse.city AND DATE(f.arrival_time) BETWEEN mse.start_date AND mse.end_date;

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight with an infant.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.passenger_id) FROM Bookings b JOIN Passengers p ON b.passenger_id = p.passenger_id WHERE p.age < 2;

natural_language_query: Show the most popular destinations for backpacking trips.
sql_query: SELECT arr.name, COUNT(*) as backpacker_count FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE b.travel_style = 'Backpacking' GROUP BY arr.name ORDER BY backpacker_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'chocolate tasting' session.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardDining od ON f.flight_id = od.flight_id WHERE od.experience = 'Chocolate Tasting';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a library.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Library%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of empty seats per flight for each airline.
sql_query: SELECT al.name, AVG(a.capacity - pax_count) FROM Airlines al JOIN (SELECT f.airline_id, f.flight_id, a.capacity, COUNT(b.booking_id) as pax_count FROM Flights f JOIN Aircrafts a ON f.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id LEFT JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id GROUP BY f.flight_id) as flight_data ON al.airline_id = flight_data.airline_id GROUP BY al.name;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's headquarters address.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET hq_address = 'PO Box 66100, Chicago, IL 60666' WHERE name = 'United Airlines';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'magic show' on board.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEntertainment oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.type = 'Magic Show';

natural_language_query: List all airline gate agents at an airport.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM AirlineStaff WHERE airport_id = 123 AND role = 'Gate Agent';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from priority boarding fees.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(priority_boarding_fee) FROM AncillaryPurchases;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying racing cars.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.content_type = 'Racing Car' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a political summit.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN PoliticalSummits ps ON f.arrival_city = ps.city AND DATE(f.arrival_time) BETWEEN ps.start_date AND ps.end_date;

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight with a pet.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.passenger_id) FROM Bookings b JOIN SpecialRequests sr ON b.booking_id = sr.booking_id WHERE sr.request_type = 'Pet in Cabin';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'cheese tasting' session.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardDining od ON f.flight_id = od.flight_id WHERE od.experience = 'Cheese Tasting';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of days a ticket is booked before departure for each travel class.
sql_query: SELECT t.class, AVG(JULIANDAY(f.departure_time) - JULIANDAY(b.booking_date)) FROM Tickets t JOIN Bookings b ON t.booking_id = b.booking_id JOIN Flights f ON b.flight_id = f.flight_id GROUP BY t.class;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's chairman of the board.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET chairman = 'Scott Kirby' WHERE name = 'United Airlines';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have an 'improv comedy' show.

natural_language_query: List all airline check-in counter staff.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM AirlineStaff WHERE role = 'Check-in Agent';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from extra legroom seat fees.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(extra_legroom_fee) FROM SeatUpgrades;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying art exhibitions.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.content_type = 'Art Exhibition' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a film festival.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FilmFestivals ff ON f.arrival_city = ff.city AND DATE(f.arrival_time) BETWEEN ff.start_date AND ff.end_date;

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight with a musical instrument.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.passenger_id) FROM Bookings b JOIN Baggage bg ON b.booking_id = bg.booking_id WHERE bg.type = 'Musical Instrument';

natural_language_query: Show the most popular destinations for budget travel.
sql_query: SELECT arr.name, COUNT(*) as budget_traveler_count FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE b.travel_style = 'Budget' GROUP BY arr.name ORDER BY budget_traveler_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'coffee tasting' session.

natural_language_query: Find the average flight duration for each airline.
sql_query: SELECT al.name, AVG((strftime('%s', f.arrival_time) - strftime('%s', f.departure_time))/60.0) as avg_duration_minutes FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id GROUP BY al.name;

natural_language_query: List all airline lost and found staff.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM AirlineStaff WHERE role = 'Lost and Found Agent';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from baggage fees.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(fee) FROM BaggageFees;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying symphony orchestras.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id WHERE c.content_type = 'Symphony Orchestra Equipment' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a fashion week event.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN FashionWeeks fw ON f.arrival_city = fw.city AND DATE(f.arrival_time) BETWEEN fw.start_date AND fw.end_date;

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight with sports equipment.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.passenger_id) FROM Bookings b JOIN Baggage bg ON b.booking_id = bg.booking_id WHERE bg.type = 'Sports Equipment';

natural_language_query: Show the most popular destinations for cultural tourism.
sql_query: SELECT arr.name, COUNT(*) as cultural_tourist_count FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE b.travel_interest = 'Culture' GROUP BY arr.name ORDER BY cultural_tourist_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'tea tasting' session.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardDining od ON f.flight_id = od.flight_id WHERE od.experience = 'Tea Tasting';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a business center.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Business Center%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of flights per day for each airport.
sql_query: SELECT ap.name, AVG(flight_count) FROM Airports ap JOIN (SELECT departure_airport_id, DATE(departure_time) as day, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Flights GROUP BY departure_airport_id, day) as daily_flights ON ap.airport_id = daily_flights.departure_airport_id GROUP BY ap.name;

natural_language_query: Update the airline's vision statement.
sql_query: UPDATE Airlines SET vision_statement = 'To be the worlds most trusted airline.' WHERE name = 'Delta Air Lines';

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'science demonstration' for kids.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardEntertainment oe ON f.flight_id = oe.flight_id WHERE oe.type = 'Science Demo';

natural_language_query: List all airline special assistance staff.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM AirlineStaff WHERE role = 'Special Assistance Agent';

natural_language_query: Calculate the total revenue from cancellation fees.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(cancellation_fee) FROM Cancellations;

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights carrying presidential entourages.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Passengers p ON f.flight_id = p.flight_id WHERE p.passenger_type = 'Presidential Entourage' GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been affected by a major conference.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights f JOIN MajorConferences mc ON f.arrival_city = mc.city AND DATE(f.arrival_time) BETWEEN mc.start_date AND mc.end_date;

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have booked a flight with extra baggage.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT passenger_id) FROM Baggage WHERE is_excess = 1;

natural_language_query: Show the most popular destinations for food tourism.
sql_query: SELECT arr.name, COUNT(*) as foodie_count FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE b.travel_interest = 'Food' GROUP BY arr.name ORDER BY foodie_count DESC LIMIT 10;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a 'craft beer tasting' session.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN OnboardDining od ON f.flight_id = od.flight_id WHERE od.experience = 'Craft Beer Tasting';

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a conference center.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Conference Center%';

natural_language_query: Find all airports in the southern hemisphere.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE latitude < 0;

natural_language_query: List all pilots who are certified for night flights.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Pilots WHERE night_flight_certified = 1;

natural_language_query: Calculate the average number of seats per aircraft for each manufacturer.
sql_query: SELECT manufacturer, AVG(capacity) FROM Aircrafts GROUP BY manufacturer;

natural_language_query: Find the flight with the highest fuel consumption.
sql_query: SELECT flight_number, fuel_consumption_liters FROM Flights ORDER BY fuel_consumption_liters DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: Update the nationality of a passenger.
sql_query: UPDATE Passengers SET nationality = 'Canadian' WHERE passenger_id = 67890;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that depart from a specific timezone (e.g., 'PST').
sql_query: SELECT f.* FROM Flights f JOIN Airports dep ON f.departure_airport_id = dep.airport_id WHERE dep.timezone = 'America/Los_Angeles';

natural_language_query: List all aircraft that have had more than 5 unscheduled maintenance events.
sql_query: SELECT a.registration, COUNT(m.maintenance_id) as unscheduled_maintenance_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Maintenance m ON a.aircraft_id = m.aircraft_id WHERE m.is_scheduled = 0 GROUP BY a.registration HAVING unscheduled_maintenance_count > 5;

natural_language_query: Find the total number of available seats for flights departing from 'LHR' tomorrow.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(a.capacity - flight_bookings.pax_count) FROM Flights f JOIN Aircrafts a ON f.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id JOIN (SELECT flight_id, COUNT(booking_id) as pax_count FROM Bookings GROUP BY flight_id) as flight_bookings ON f.flight_id = flight_bookings.flight_id WHERE f.departure_airport_id = (SELECT airport_id FROM Airports WHERE iata_code = 'LHR') AND DATE(f.departure_time) = DATE('now', '+1 day');

natural_language_query: Add a 'last_flown_date' to the Pilots table.
sql_query: ALTER TABLE Pilots ADD COLUMN last_flown_date DATE;

natural_language_query: Find all routes that are not operated on weekends.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE route_id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT route_id FROM Flights WHERE STRFTIME('%w', departure_time) IN ('0', '6'));

natural_language_query: List all passengers who have the same first and last name as another passenger.
sql_query: SELECT p1.first_name, p1.last_name FROM Passengers p1 JOIN Passengers p2 ON p1.first_name = p2.first_name AND p1.last_name = p2.last_name AND p1.passenger_id != p2.passenger_id;

natural_language_query: Find the average flight occupancy rate for each month of the year.
sql_query: SELECT STRFTIME('%Y-%m', f.departure_time) as month, AVG((pax_count * 100.0) / a.capacity) as avg_occupancy FROM Flights f JOIN Aircrafts a ON f.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT flight_id, COUNT(booking_id) as pax_count FROM Bookings GROUP BY flight_id) as flight_data ON f.flight_id = flight_data.flight_id GROUP BY month;

natural_language_query: Create a view showing flights with their departure and arrival cities and countries.
sql_query: CREATE VIEW FlightDestinations AS SELECT f.flight_number, dep.city as departure_city, dep.country as departure_country, arr.city as arrival_city, arr.country as arrival_country FROM Flights f JOIN Airports dep ON f.departure_airport_id = dep.airport_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id;

natural_language_query: Find all aircraft that have a two-class configuration (Economy and Business).
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Aircrafts WHERE aircraft_id IN (SELECT aircraft_id FROM SeatConfigurations GROUP BY aircraft_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT class) = 2 AND SUM(CASE WHEN class IN ('Economy', 'Business') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 2);

natural_language_query: List all flights that have been delayed due to a passenger issue.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights WHERE flight_id IN (SELECT flight_id FROM Delays WHERE reason LIKE '%passenger%');

natural_language_query: Find the total number of loyalty points required for a free flight on a specific route.
sql_query: SELECT points_required FROM LoyaltyRewards WHERE reward_type = 'Free Flight' AND route_id = 123;

natural_language_query: Update the airport's ICAO code for 'LAX' to 'KLAX'.
sql_query: UPDATE Airports SET icao_code = 'KLAX' WHERE iata_code = 'LAX';

natural_language_query: Find all flights where the pilot and copilot have the same nationality.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Crews c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id JOIN Pilots p1 ON c.pilot_id = p1.pilot_id JOIN Pilots p2 ON c.copilot_id = p2.pilot_id WHERE p1.nationality = p2.nationality;

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a helipad.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%Helipad%';

natural_language_query: Calculate the average number of flights per aircraft per day.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(flights_per_day) FROM (SELECT aircraft_id, DATE(departure_time) as day, COUNT(*) as flights_per_day FROM Flights GROUP BY aircraft_id, day);

natural_language_query: Find the most common aircraft model for flights longer than 8000 km.
sql_query: SELECT a.model, a.manufacturer, COUNT(*) as flight_count FROM Aircrafts a JOIN Flights f ON a.aircraft_id = f.aircraft_id JOIN Routes r ON f.route_id = r.route_id WHERE r.distance_km > 8000 GROUP BY a.model, a.manufacturer ORDER BY flight_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all passengers who have booked a flight to a country they are a citizen of, but are not currently residing in.
sql_query: SELECT p.* FROM Passengers p JOIN Bookings b ON p.passenger_id = b.passenger_id JOIN Flights f ON b.flight_id = f.flight_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE p.nationality = arr.country AND p.residence_country != arr.country;

natural_language_query: Find the total number of children under 12 flying on a specific flight.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Passengers p JOIN Bookings b ON p.passenger_id = b.passenger_id WHERE b.flight_id = 1234 AND p.age < 12;

natural_language_query: Add a 'preferred_seat_type' (aisle/window) to the Passengers table.
sql_query: ALTER TABLE Passengers ADD COLUMN preferred_seat_type VARCHAR(10);

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have had a diversion and calculate the extra distance flown.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number, ST_Distance(arr.location, div.location) + ST_Distance(div.location, orig_arr.location) - ST_Distance(arr.location, orig_arr.location) as extra_distance FROM Flights f JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id JOIN Airports div ON f.diversion_airport_id = div.airport_id JOIN Airports orig_arr ON f.original_arrival_airport_id = orig_arr.airport_id WHERE f.status = 'Diverted';

natural_language_query: List all aircraft that are currently flying over the Pacific Ocean.
sql_query: SELECT a.* FROM Aircrafts a JOIN CurrentFlightPositions cfp ON a.aircraft_id = cfp.aircraft_id WHERE cfp.ocean = 'Pacific';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of cabin crew members for each airline.
sql_query: SELECT al.name, AVG(c.cabin_crew_count) FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id JOIN Crews c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id GROUP BY al.name;

natural_language_query: Update the price of all business class tickets for a specific route by 10%.
sql_query: UPDATE Tickets SET price = price * 1.10 WHERE class = 'Business' AND flight_id IN (SELECT flight_id FROM Flights WHERE route_id = 456);

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have had a 'go-around' on approach.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights WHERE flight_id IN (SELECT flight_id FROM FlightEvents WHERE event_type = 'Go-around');

natural_language_query: List all pilots who are due for a medical check-up in the next 30 days.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Pilots WHERE medical_expiry_date BETWEEN DATE('now') AND DATE('now', '+30 days');

natural_language_query: Calculate the total cargo weight for each flight.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number, SUM(c.weight_kg) as total_cargo_weight FROM Flights f JOIN Cargo c ON f.flight_id = c.flight_id GROUP BY f.flight_number;

natural_language_query: Find the most common special meal request.
sql_query: SELECT request_type, COUNT(*) as request_count FROM SpecialRequests WHERE request_type LIKE '%Meal%' GROUP BY request_type ORDER BY request_count DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: List all flights that have had their departure time changed more than 3 times.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Flights WHERE flight_id IN (SELECT flight_id FROM FlightTimeChanges GROUP BY flight_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3);

natural_language_query: Find the number of passengers who have a connecting flight in less than 60 minutes.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.passenger_id) FROM Tickets t JOIN Flights f1 ON t.flight1_id = f1.flight_id JOIN Flights f2 ON t.flight2_id = f2.flight_id WHERE (strftime('%s', f2.departure_time) - strftime('%s', f1.arrival_time)) < 3600;

natural_language_query: Show the top 5 airports with the highest number of international flights.
sql_query: SELECT ap.name, COUNT(*) as international_flight_count FROM Airports ap JOIN Flights f ON ap.airport_id = f.departure_airport_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE ap.country != arr.country GROUP BY ap.name ORDER BY international_flight_count DESC LIMIT 5;

natural_language_query: Find all aircraft that have not flown in the last 90 days.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Aircrafts WHERE last_flown_date < DATE('now', '-90 days');

natural_language_query: List all passengers who have booked flights to at least 3 different continents in the last year.
sql_query: SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name FROM Passengers p JOIN Bookings b ON p.passenger_id = b.passenger_id JOIN Flights f ON b.flight_id = f.flight_id JOIN Airports arr ON f.arrival_airport_id = arr.airport_id WHERE f.departure_time > DATE('now', '-1 year') GROUP BY p.passenger_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT arr.continent) >= 3;

natural_language_query: Calculate the percentage of flights that have Wi-Fi available, grouped by airline.
sql_query: SELECT al.name, (COUNT(CASE WHEN am.type = 'Wi-Fi' THEN 1 END) * 100.0) / COUNT(DISTINCT f.flight_id) as wifi_percentage FROM Airlines al JOIN Flights f ON al.airline_id = f.airline_id JOIN Aircrafts a ON f.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id LEFT JOIN Amenities am ON a.aircraft_id = am.aircraft_id GROUP BY al.name;

natural_language_query: Find the pilot who has flown the most night hours.
sql_query: SELECT p.name, SUM(f.night_flight_duration_hours) as total_night_hours FROM Pilots p JOIN Crews c ON p.pilot_id = c.pilot_id JOIN Flights f ON c.flight_id = f.flight_id GROUP BY p.pilot_id ORDER BY total_night_hours DESC LIMIT 1;

natural_language_query: Update the status of all passengers on a cancelled flight to 'Rebooking required'.
sql_query: UPDATE Bookings SET status = 'Rebooking required' WHERE flight_id IN (SELECT flight_id FROM Flights WHERE status = 'Cancelled');

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have a turnaround time of exactly 60 minutes.
sql_query: WITH FlightTurnarounds AS (SELECT aircraft_id, arrival_time, LEAD(departure_time, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY aircraft_id ORDER BY arrival_time) as next_departure FROM Flights) SELECT * FROM FlightTurnarounds WHERE (strftime('%s', next_departure) - strftime('%s', arrival_time)) = 3600;

natural_language_query: List all airports that have a currency exchange service open 24/7.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Airports WHERE amenities LIKE '%24/7 Currency Exchange%';

natural_language_query: Find the average number of passengers per flight for each day of the week.
sql_query: SELECT STRFTIME('%w', f.departure_time) as day_of_week, AVG(pax_count) FROM Flights f JOIN (SELECT flight_id, COUNT(booking_id) as pax_count FROM Bookings GROUP BY flight_id) as flight_data ON f.flight_id = flight_data.flight_id GROUP BY day_of_week;

natural_language_query: Add a 'is_active' boolean column to the Routes table.
sql_query: ALTER TABLE Routes ADD COLUMN is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1;

natural_language_query: Find all flights where the number of checked bags exceeds the number of passengers.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN (SELECT flight_id, COUNT(*) as bag_count FROM CheckedBaggage GROUP BY flight_id) as baggage_counts ON f.flight_id = baggage_counts.flight_id JOIN (SELECT flight_id, COUNT(*) as pax_count FROM Bookings GROUP BY flight_id) as passenger_counts ON f.flight_id = passenger_counts.flight_id WHERE baggage_counts.bag_count > passenger_counts.pax_count;

natural_language_query: List all pilots who are certified on more than 3 types of aircraft.
sql_query: SELECT p.name, COUNT(c.aircraft_model) as certified_models FROM Pilots p JOIN Certifications c ON p.pilot_id = c.pilot_id GROUP BY p.pilot_id HAVING certified_models > 3;

natural_language_query: Find the total revenue from flights that were less than 50% full.
sql_query: SELECT SUM(t.price) FROM Tickets t JOIN Flights f ON t.flight_id = f.flight_id JOIN (SELECT flight_id, COUNT(booking_id) as pax_count FROM Bookings GROUP BY flight_id) as flight_data ON f.flight_id = flight_data.flight_id JOIN Aircrafts a ON f.aircraft_id = a.aircraft_id WHERE (flight_data.pax_count * 1.0 / a.capacity) < 0.5;

natural_language_query: Create a materialized view for daily flight statistics.
sql_query: CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW DailyFlightStats AS SELECT DATE(departure_time) as day, COUNT(*) as total_flights, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'Delayed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as delayed_flights, AVG((strftime('%s', arrival_time) - strftime('%s', departure_time))/60.0) as avg_duration_minutes FROM Flights GROUP BY day;

natural_language_query: Find all flights that have at least one passenger from every continent.
sql_query: SELECT f.flight_number FROM Flights f JOIN Bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id JOIN Passengers p ON b.passenger_id = p.passenger_id GROUP BY f.flight_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT p.continent_of_residence) = 7;

natural_language_query: List all maintenance events that required a part replacement.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM Maintenance WHERE part_replaced = 1;

natural_language_query: Find the average number of days between a pilot's certification and their first flight on that aircraft type.
